original_title: Singer Premium Furniture at One Galle Face presents furniture styling workshop
original_body_lines: Singer Sri Lanka invited customers to an exclusive workshop on “Mastering Furniture Styling.” The event took place on 24th June 2023, at Singer’s Flagship Store for Premium Furniture at One Galle Face.

The workshop aimed to empower valuable customers with the knowledge and skills necessary to select, place, and accessorize furniture for stunning living spaces. Pasanga Abeywardena, Managing Director & Head of Interior Design at Pasanga Abeywardena Designs (Pvt) Ltd., conducted the workshop, sharing her expertise and experience in the field. Pasanga guided participants through the intricacies of furniture styling, helping them transform their homes into havens of style and comfort.

“We believe that furniture styling is an art that can elevate any space,”says Pasanga, renowned interior designer. “I’m impressed by the exquisite furniture pieces showcased at Singer’s Flagship Store and I am truly delighted to have had the opportunity to share my insights and help customers create truly exceptional living spaces.”
Singer Premium Furniture at One Galle Face Presents a Furniture Styling Workshop for Customers
